00001 // script.aculo.us slider.js v1.8.1, Thu Jan 03 22:07:12 -0500 2008

00007 
00008 if (!Control) var Control = { };
00009 
00010 // options:
00011 //  axis: 'vertical', or 'horizontal' (default)
00012 //
00013 // callbacks:
00014 //  onChange(value)
00015 //  onSlide(value)
00016 Control.Slider = Class.create({
00017   initialize: function(handle, track, options) {
00018     var slider = this;
00019     
00020     if (Object.isArray(handle)) {
00021       this.handles = handle.collect( function(e) { return $(e) });
00022     } else {
00023       this.handles = [$(handle)];
00024     }
00025     
00026     this.track   = $(track);
00027     this.options = options || { };
00028 
00029     this.axis      = this.options.axis || 'horizontal';
00030     this.increment = this.options.increment || 1;
00031     this.step      = parseInt(this.options.step || '1');
00032     this.range     = this.options.range || $R(0,1);
00033     
00034     this.value     = 0; // assure backwards compat
00035     this.values    = this.handles.map( function() { return 0 });
00036     this.spans     = this.options.spans ? this.options.spans.map(function(s){ return $(s) }) : false;
00037     this.options.startSpan = $(this.options.startSpan || null);
00038     this.options.endSpan   = $(this.options.endSpan || null);
00039 
00040     this.restricted = this.options.restricted || false;
00041 
00042     this.maximum   = this.options.maximum || this.range.end;
00043     this.minimum   = this.options.minimum || this.range.start;
00044 
00045     // Will be used to align the handle onto the track, if necessary
00046     this.alignX = parseInt(this.options.alignX || '0');
00047     this.alignY = parseInt(this.options.alignY || '0');
00048     
00049     this.trackLength = this.maximumOffset() - this.minimumOffset();
00050 
00051     this.handleLength = this.isVertical() ? 
00052       (this.handles[0].offsetHeight != 0 ? 
00053         this.handles[0].offsetHeight : this.handles[0].style.height.replace(/px$/,"")) : 
00054       (this.handles[0].offsetWidth != 0 ? this.handles[0].offsetWidth : 
00055         this.handles[0].style.width.replace(/px$/,""));
00056 
00057     this.active   = false;
00058     this.dragging = false;
00059     this.disabled = false;
00060 
00061     if (this.options.disabled) this.setDisabled();
00062 
00063     // Allowed values array
00064     this.allowedValues = this.options.values ? this.options.values.sortBy(Prototype.K) : false;
00065     if (this.allowedValues) {
00066       this.minimum = this.allowedValues.min();
00067       this.maximum = this.allowedValues.max();
00068     }
00069 
00070     this.eventMouseDown = this.startDrag.bindAsEventListener(this);
00071     this.eventMouseUp   = this.endDrag.bindAsEventListener(this);
00072     this.eventMouseMove = this.update.bindAsEventListener(this);
00073 
00074     // Initialize handles in reverse (make sure first handle is active)
00075     this.handles.each( function(h,i) {
00076       i = slider.handles.length-1-i;
00077       slider.setValue(parseFloat(
00078         (Object.isArray(slider.options.sliderValue) ? 
00079           slider.options.sliderValue[i] : slider.options.sliderValue) || 
00080          slider.range.start), i);
00081       h.makePositioned().observe("mousedown", slider.eventMouseDown);
00082     });
00083     
00084     this.track.observe("mousedown", this.eventMouseDown);
00085     document.observe("mouseup", this.eventMouseUp);
00086     document.observe("mousemove", this.eventMouseMove);
00087     
00088     this.initialized = true;
00089   },
00090   dispose: function() {
00091     var slider = this;    
00092     Event.stopObserving(this.track, "mousedown", this.eventMouseDown);
00093     Event.stopObserving(document, "mouseup", this.eventMouseUp);
00094     Event.stopObserving(document, "mousemove", this.eventMouseMove);
00095     this.handles.each( function(h) {
00096       Event.stopObserving(h, "mousedown", slider.eventMouseDown);
00097     });
00098   },
00099   setDisabled: function(){
00100     this.disabled = true;
00101   },
00102   setEnabled: function(){
00103     this.disabled = false;
00104   },  
00105   getNearestValue: function(value){
00106     if (this.allowedValues){
00107       if (value >= this.allowedValues.max()) return(this.allowedValues.max());
00108       if (value <= this.allowedValues.min()) return(this.allowedValues.min());
00109       
00110       var offset = Math.abs(this.allowedValues[0] - value);
00111       var newValue = this.allowedValues[0];
00112       this.allowedValues.each( function(v) {
00113         var currentOffset = Math.abs(v - value);
00114         if (currentOffset <= offset){
00115           newValue = v;
00116           offset = currentOffset;
00117         } 
00118       });
00119       return newValue;
00120     }
00121     if (value > this.range.end) return this.range.end;
00122     if (value < this.range.start) return this.range.start;
00123     return value;
00124   },
00125   setValue: function(sliderValue, handleIdx){
00126     if (!this.active) {
00127       this.activeHandleIdx = handleIdx || 0;
00128       this.activeHandle    = this.handles[this.activeHandleIdx];
00129       this.updateStyles();
00130     }
00131     handleIdx = handleIdx || this.activeHandleIdx || 0;
00132     if (this.initialized && this.restricted) {
00133       if ((handleIdx>0) && (sliderValue<this.values[handleIdx-1]))
00134         sliderValue = this.values[handleIdx-1];
00135       if ((handleIdx < (this.handles.length-1)) && (sliderValue>this.values[handleIdx+1]))
00136         sliderValue = this.values[handleIdx+1];
00137     }
00138     sliderValue = this.getNearestValue(sliderValue);
00139     this.values[handleIdx] = sliderValue;
00140     this.value = this.values[0]; // assure backwards compat
00141     
00142     this.handles[handleIdx].style[this.isVertical() ? 'top' : 'left'] = 
00143       this.translateToPx(sliderValue);
00144     
00145     this.drawSpans();
00146     if (!this.dragging || !this.event) this.updateFinished();
00147   },
00148   setValueBy: function(delta, handleIdx) {
00149     this.setValue(this.values[handleIdx || this.activeHandleIdx || 0] + delta, 
00150       handleIdx || this.activeHandleIdx || 0);
00151   },
00152   translateToPx: function(value) {
00153     return Math.round(
00154       ((this.trackLength-this.handleLength)/(this.range.end-this.range.start)) * 
00155       (value - this.range.start)) + "px";
00156   },
00157   translateToValue: function(offset) {
00158     return ((offset/(this.trackLength-this.handleLength) * 
00159       (this.range.end-this.range.start)) + this.range.start);
00160   },
00161   getRange: function(range) {
00162     var v = this.values.sortBy(Prototype.K); 
00163     range = range || 0;
00164     return $R(v[range],v[range+1]);
00165   },
00166   minimumOffset: function(){
00167     return(this.isVertical() ? this.alignY : this.alignX);
00168   },
00169   maximumOffset: function(){
00170     return(this.isVertical() ? 
00171       (this.track.offsetHeight != 0 ? this.track.offsetHeight :
00172         this.track.style.height.replace(/px$/,"")) - this.alignY : 
00173       (this.track.offsetWidth != 0 ? this.track.offsetWidth : 
00174         this.track.style.width.replace(/px$/,"")) - this.alignX);
00175   },  
00176   isVertical:  function(){
00177     return (this.axis == 'vertical');
00178   },
00179   drawSpans: function() {
00180     var slider = this;
00181     if (this.spans)
00182       $R(0, this.spans.length-1).each(function(r) { slider.setSpan(slider.spans[r], slider.getRange(r)) });
00183     if (this.options.startSpan)
00184       this.setSpan(this.options.startSpan,
00185         $R(0, this.values.length>1 ? this.getRange(0).min() : this.value ));
00186     if (this.options.endSpan)
00187       this.setSpan(this.options.endSpan, 
00188         $R(this.values.length>1 ? this.getRange(this.spans.length-1).max() : this.value, this.maximum));
00189   },
00190   setSpan: function(span, range) {
00191     if (this.isVertical()) {
00192       span.style.top = this.translateToPx(range.start);
00193       span.style.height = this.translateToPx(range.end - range.start + this.range.start);
00194     } else {
00195       span.style.left = this.translateToPx(range.start);
00196       span.style.width = this.translateToPx(range.end - range.start + this.range.start);
00197     }
00198   },
00199   updateStyles: function() {
00200     this.handles.each( function(h){ Element.removeClassName(h, 'selected') });
00201     Element.addClassName(this.activeHandle, 'selected');
00202   },
00203   startDrag: function(event) {
00204     if (Event.isLeftClick(event)) {
00205       if (!this.disabled){
00206         this.active = true;
00207         
00208         var handle = Event.element(event);
00209         var pointer  = [Event.pointerX(event), Event.pointerY(event)];
00210         var track = handle;
00211         if (track==this.track) {
00212           var offsets  = Position.cumulativeOffset(this.track); 
00213           this.event = event;
00214           this.setValue(this.translateToValue( 
00215            (this.isVertical() ? pointer[1]-offsets[1] : pointer[0]-offsets[0])-(this.handleLength/2)
00216           ));
00217           var offsets  = Position.cumulativeOffset(this.activeHandle);
00218           this.offsetX = (pointer[0] - offsets[0]);
00219           this.offsetY = (pointer[1] - offsets[1]);
00220         } else {
00221           // find the handle (prevents issues with Safari)
00222           while((this.handles.indexOf(handle) == -1) && handle.parentNode) 
00223             handle = handle.parentNode;
00224             
00225           if (this.handles.indexOf(handle)!=-1) {
00226             this.activeHandle    = handle;
00227             this.activeHandleIdx = this.handles.indexOf(this.activeHandle);
00228             this.updateStyles();
00229             
00230             var offsets  = Position.cumulativeOffset(this.activeHandle);
00231             this.offsetX = (pointer[0] - offsets[0]);
00232             this.offsetY = (pointer[1] - offsets[1]);
00233           }
00234         }
00235       }
00236       Event.stop(event);
00237     }
00238   },
00239   update: function(event) {
00240    if (this.active) {
00241       if (!this.dragging) this.dragging = true;
00242       this.draw(event);
00243       if (Prototype.Browser.WebKit) window.scrollBy(0,0);
00244       Event.stop(event);
00245    }
00246   },
00247   draw: function(event) {
00248     var pointer = [Event.pointerX(event), Event.pointerY(event)];
00249     var offsets = Position.cumulativeOffset(this.track);
00250     pointer[0] -= this.offsetX + offsets[0];
00251     pointer[1] -= this.offsetY + offsets[1];
00252     this.event = event;
00253     this.setValue(this.translateToValue( this.isVertical() ? pointer[1] : pointer[0] ));
00254     if (this.initialized && this.options.onSlide)
00255       this.options.onSlide(this.values.length>1 ? this.values : this.value, this);
00256   },
00257   endDrag: function(event) {
00258     if (this.active && this.dragging) {
00259       this.finishDrag(event, true);
00260       Event.stop(event);
00261     }
00262     this.active = false;
00263     this.dragging = false;
00264   },  
00265   finishDrag: function(event, success) {
00266     this.active = false;
00267     this.dragging = false;
00268     this.updateFinished();
00269   },
00270   updateFinished: function() {
00271     if (this.initialized && this.options.onChange) 
00272       this.options.onChange(this.values.length>1 ? this.values : this.value, this);
00273     this.event = null;
00274   }
00275 });
